context: Tests whether the agent follows the persona onboarding structure from the skill's setup flow, producing voice.md, bio.md, and examples.md with the correct sections, analysis depth across all six dimensions, and format requirements.

checklist.name: Voice one-paragraph section
checklist.description: persona/voice.md contains a section titled 'The Voice in One Paragraph' (or closely equivalent) with a synthesized description of the author's voice

checklist.name: Rhetorical devices with quotes
checklist.description: persona/voice.md contains a section on rhetorical devices with at least 3 named devices, each illustrated with direct quotes pulled from the writing samples

checklist.name: Cultural reference analysis
checklist.description: persona/voice.md contains a section analyzing the cultural reference style (what domains, how often, whether explained or left for the reader)

checklist.name: Recurring characters identified
checklist.description: persona/voice.md contains a section on recurring characters that identifies Dex as a recurring figure and describes their role/dynamic with the author

checklist.name: Voice consistency notes
checklist.description: persona/voice.md contains a section on voice consistency (how the voice behaves in technical sections, whether it changes register)

checklist.name: Humor analysis present
checklist.description: persona/voice.md analyzes the author's humor style (type, frequency, calibration) -- either as a standalone section or clearly integrated into the rhetorical devices section

checklist.name: Bio schema present
checklist.description: persona/bio.md contains a bio template/schema with variable parts marked, incorporating the provided info (name, role at Lattice Systems, embedded systems background)

checklist.name: Bio kicker notes
checklist.description: persona/bio.md contains a section on kicker notes specifying that the kicker should be rotating and describing the expected tone (matching the author's style)

checklist.name: Examples file created
checklist.description: persona/examples.md exists and lists all three writing samples with their titles and/or URLs

checklist.name: Examples have pattern annotations
checklist.description: Each entry in persona/examples.md includes a note about what voice patterns that sample demonstrates (not just the title/URL)

checklist.name: Product context skipped
checklist.description: No persona/product.md file is created, OR it exists but is empty/explicitly states no product context -- since the author said to skip product context
